shortdesc.ph: Callback when a remote user (in communication) or host (in live streaming) stops or resumes sending audio streams.
Occurs when a remote user (in the Communication profile) or host (in the Live Broadcast profile) stops or resumes sending audio streams.
Occurs when a remote user (in communication) or host (in live streaming) stops or resumes sending audio stream.
Callback when a remote user (in a communication scenario) or host (in a live streaming scenario) stops or resumes sending audio stream.

p.codeblock: final void Function(RtcConnection connection, int remoteUid, bool muted)? onUserMuteAudio;
public virtual void OnUserMuteAudio(RtcConnection connection, uint remoteUid, bool muted) { }

section.p: This callback is triggered when the remote user calls the method to disable or enable audio sending.
This callback is triggered when a remote user calls to stop or resume sending audio.
This callback is triggered when a remote user calls the method to disable or enable audio sending.
This callback is triggered when the remote user calls the method to disable or enable audio sending.
section.note: When the number of users (in communication) or hosts (in live streaming) in the channel exceeds 32, this callback may be inaccurate.
This callback may be inaccurate when the number of users (in the Communication profile) or hosts (in the Live Broadcast profile) in the channel exceeds 32.
When the number of users (in communication) or hosts (in live streaming) in the channel exceeds 32, this callback may be inaccurate.
When there are more than 32 users (in a communication scenario) or hosts (in a live streaming scenario) in the channel, this callback may be inaccurate.

plentry.pd:
Whether the user is muted:
: The user has muted the audio.
: The user has unmuted the audio.

: The user has muted the audio.
: The user has unmuted the audio.
